item.description:
Enjoy a Cold Stones Ice Cream - then burn it off Kayaking!

Meet at Cold Stone Creamery  in Southboro at 2:00 pm.
Next to Starbucks at 154 Turnpike Road/Route 9

After enjoying a delicious ice cream or starbucks frappuccino, we'll head on over to Hopkinton State Park to Kayak for an hour or two. 

There is a $7 park admission fee. If you have a Mass State Park Pass, it's free.

Kayak Rentals are $15/hour and you can decide while you are kayaking if you want to stay out more than an hour.

No need to pay in advance, but please only RSVP if you plan on attending.

Bring a lawn chair to hang out by the water afterwards.

We can leave cars at the office park adjacent to the Starbucks parking lot and carpool to the park.  If you prefer not to kayak, but just sit out by the lake, feel free to still join us.

If you prefer a sandwich, iced coffee or something other than ice cream, there is a Quiznos, Italian Market, and Starbucks in this same plaza.
item.name: Ice Cream and Kayaking in Hopkinton
